#Numi flux, Feb 12, from Arturo; from 1.5 GeV to 10 GeV
beam_type=0

# the PDG code of the beam particle
# 12 - nu_e    
# 14 - nu_mu
# 16 - nu_tau
# -12 - anti_nu_e
# -14 - anti_nu_mu
# -16 - anti_nu_tau

beam_particle      = 14

# The direction of the beam given as a 3 coordinates of the vector alligned with the beam

beam_direction     = 0 0 1
